444780.name: Death Goat Soundtrack Vol. 2
444780.description:
Volume 2 of the Death Goat Soundtrack features 7 new songs exclusive to the Steam release. Featuring a wide array of Metal genres from some of the best independent artists in the scene today.

Your purchase of this soundtrack will go directly to supporting these independent artists, as we have arranged to provide 100% of the funds we receive for this DLC directly to the bands.

Track Listing:

  • Aegaeon - The Integral Path
  • Brutai - Deep
  • Kardashev - Lucido
  • Dawn Of Leviathan - Adrift With Knowledge
  • Extinction Level Event - Entropy
  • Mare Cognitum - Entropic Hallucinations
  • NYN - Torrential Flames
444780.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
